sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.
sentences.chinese: 微電鑄工藝兼具掩膜電鍍和厚膜結構電鑄的雙重特徵。

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面臨着水土流失和新建大壩的雙重威脅。

sentences.english: County-level cities have both urban and rural dual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 縣級市兼有城市和農村的雙重特性。

sentences.english: The functions of the signage and wayfinding system are dual.
sentences.chinese: 標識導向系統所發揮的功能是雙重的。

sentences.english: Leisure culture is characteristic of both poetry and secularity.
sentences.chinese: 休閒文化具有詩性和世俗性雙重品格。

sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dualistic nature.
sentences.chinese: 由於具雙重性格，有時候他們可能會悲觀厭世。

sentences.english: Sam:How long am i gonna be on double-secret probation?
sentences.chinese: 我還要接受你這種雙重機密對待多久？

sentences.english: From its formation we can easily define it refers to both double negative sentence and imperative sentence.
sentences.chinese: 僅從形式上看，它就與雙重否定句和祈使句都有交叉。

sentences.english: They are motivated by the twin color=# cc0066> goads of punishment and reward.
sentences.chinese: 他們受賞與罰的雙重因素所激勵。

sentences.english: While improving democracy, network expression may have its adverse effect upon maintenance of social order.
sentences.chinese: 網絡表達具有增進民主和誘致秩序失範的雙重屬性。

sentences.english: This kind of interferogram carries double informations on quantity and direction of displacement vector.
sentences.chinese: 這種干涉圖含有位移的大小和方向的雙重信息。

sentences.english: Everyday her religious schizophrenia grew, and presently she began wearing a crucifix.
sentences.chinese: 每天她的雙重信仰都在加深，現在她開是戴十字架了。

sentences.english: This way both the net and her racket head protect her.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，球網和球拍給她雙重的保護。

sentences.english: The Viking dual ability is handy.
sentences.chinese: 維京雙重能力是便利的。

sentences.english: The second option is the camera’s ‘Dual Image Stabilization‘ system which is a combination of mechanical sensor shift stabilization along with ISO and shutter speed tricks.
sentences.chinese: 第二個選擇是利用相機內的雙重成像防抖系統。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
